If you're open to venturing into a fantastical world, "Warriors of Virtue" might be right up your alley. It follows an adventure in the mythical land of Tao where our protagonist becomes the center of a conflict between animal warriors and an evil lord. Enjoy!

The voice cast includes famous actors like Ellen DeGeneres and Willem Dafoe, making it a great choice if you liked the sound of The NeverEnding Story.

Another film you might find intriguing is "Ponyo." This Japanese animated movie tells the story of a goldfish princess who falls in love with a young boy and transforms into a human. Starring Rumi Hiiragi and Yûki Amami, it's visually stunning and heartwarming, much like The NeverEnding Story.

This classic comedy is definitely worth watching!
